definition: to talk or chat about ordinary daily life
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶們到了夏天都愛坐在樹陰涼兒里拉家常。

sentences.english: T-bag: I'm just kicking it with Deputy Dawg, you know… talking women.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在跟我們的獄警拉拉家常，談談女人。

sentences.english: TB: I'm just kicking it with Deputy Dawg, you know… talking women.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在跟我們的獄警拉拉家常，談談女人。

sentences.english: I'm just kicking it with Deputy Dawg, you know… talking women.
sentences.chinese: 我只是在跟我們的獄警拉拉家常，談談女人。

definition: to sit side-by-side and have a heart-to-heart talk (idiom)
to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
the daily life of a family
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]

pinyin: dong1 jia1 chang2 xi1 jia1 duan3

definition: to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to chatter idly/to gossip/to boast or brag
